com.maxwellwheeler.plugins.tppets.commands

Class CommandTPPets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxwellwheeler.plugins.tppets.commands.CommandTPPets

  • class CommandTPPets
extends java.lang.Object
    Processes commands that actually teleport pets around

    GatheringExp

      void processCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, java.lang.String[] args, PetType.Pets pt)
      The core command handler for /tpp [pet type] [args] commands Syntax: /tpp [pet type] all Teleports all of sender's [pet type] to them Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] list Lists all of sender's [pet type] names Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] [pet name] Teleports sender's [pet type] named [pet name] to them Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] f:[username] all Teleports all of [username]'s [pet type] to sender Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] f:[username] list Lists all of [username]'s [pet type] to sender Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] f:[username] [pet name] Teleports [username]'s [pet type] named [pet name] to sender.

    • Method Detail

      • processCommand

        public void processCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                           java.lang.String[] args,
                           PetType.Pets pt)
        The core command handler for /tpp [pet type] [args] commands Syntax: /tpp [pet type] all Teleports all of sender's [pet type] to them Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] list Lists all of sender's [pet type] names Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] [pet name] Teleports sender's [pet type] named [pet name] to them Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] f:[username] all Teleports all of [username]'s [pet type] to sender Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] f:[username] list Lists all of [username]'s [pet type] to sender Alternative Syntax: /tpp [pet type] f:[username] [pet name] Teleports [username]'s [pet type] named [pet name] to sender. This works if others are allowed to the pet as well
        Parameters:
        sender - The original sender of the command
        args - Truncated arguments for the command, does not include /tpp dogs, the [pet type] argument is specified in PetType.Pets form
        pt - The pet type to teleport

      • processCommandGeneric

        private void processCommandGeneric(org.bukkit.entity.Player commandSender,
                                   org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer commandAbout,
                                   java.lang.String[] args,
                                   PetType.Pets pt)
        The generic command handler for /tpp [pet type] [args] commands. This takes Player and OfflinePlayer objects instead of raw strings, so it's used for translating f:[username]-type commands to the actual action
        Parameters:
        commandSender - The player that sent the command
        commandAbout - The player that the command is about. This can be .equals(commandSender), because Player extends OfflinePlayer
        args - For a command /tpp dogs f:[username] list, args = [list]. For a command /tpp dogs list, args = [list].
        pt - The type of pet the command is about.

      • hasPermissionToTp

        private boolean hasPermissionToTp(org.bukkit.entity.Player pl,
                                  org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer petOwner,
                                  java.lang.String petUUID)
        Checks if pl has permission to teleport petOwner's pet named petName. This works for both the tppets.teleportother permission, and /tpp allow [username] [pet name] allow. Used only when f:[username] syntax is used
        Parameters:
        pl - The player that ran the command
        petOwner - The owner of the pet, could potentially be the same as the player
        petUUID - The UUID of the pet
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not

      • loadApplicableChunks

        private void loadApplicableChunks(java.util.List<PetStorage> psList)
        Loads the chunks specified by the locations in psList
        Parameters:
        psList - The PetStorage list of pets in unloaded chunks

      • teleportSpecificPet

        private boolean teleportSpecificPet(org.bukkit.entity.Player sendTo,
                                    org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer sendFrom,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    PetType.Pets pt)
        Teleports a particular pet name from a particular owner of a particular pet type
        Parameters:
        sendTo - The player to send the pet to
        sendFrom - The player who owns the pet
        name - The name of the pet
        pt - The type of the pet
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not

      • getPetsAndTeleport

        private java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> getPetsAndTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player sendTo,
                                                         org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer sendFrom,
                                                         PetType.Pets pt)
        Teleports all pets owned by sendFrom of type pt to sendTo
        Parameters:
        sendTo - The player to send the pets to
        sendFrom - The player who owns the pets
        pt - The type of pets to teleport
        Returns:
        A set of UUIDs of the pets that have been teleported

      • loadAndTp

        private java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> loadAndTp(org.bukkit.entity.Player sendTo,
                                                org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer sendFrom,
                                                org.bukkit.World world,
                                                PetType.Pets pt,
                                                java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> alreadyTeleportedPets)
        Teleports all pets owned by sendFrom of type pt in world world not already in set alreadyTeleportedPets to sendTo
        Parameters:
        sendTo - The player to send the pets to
        sendFrom - The player who owns the pets
        world - The world to check
        pt - The type of pets to teleport
        alreadyTeleportedPets - A set representing pets that have already been teleported, so that duplicates can't exist
        Returns:
        alreadyTeleportedPets plus the new pets teleported by this command

      • isTeleportablePet

        private boolean isTeleportablePet(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer sendFrom,
                                  org.bukkit.entity.Entity ent,
                                  PetType.Pets pt)
        Checks if the pet should be teleported. Used to verify it's of the right type and is owned by the right player
        Parameters:
        sendFrom - The pet's owner
        ent - The entity to check
        pt - The pet type expected
        Returns:
        True if the pet should be teleported. False otherwise.

      • getChunkFromCoords

        private org.bukkit.Chunk getChunkFromCoords(org.bukkit.World world,
                                            int x,
                                            int z)
        Gets the chunk using normal x and z coordinates, rather than the chunkwide x and z coordinates
        Parameters:
        world - The world where the chunk is.
        x - The normal x coordinate where the chunk is.
        z - The normal z coordinate where the chunk is.
        Returns:
        The found chunk

        Teleports the pet to the player
        Parameters:
        pl - The player the pet is to be teleported to.
        entity - The entity to be teleported

        Lists the pets owned by petsFrom to pl's chat
        Parameters:

        petsFrom - The player who owns the pets
        pt - The type of pets to check for

      • canTpThere

        private boolean canTpThere(org.bukkit.entity.Player pl)
        Checks if a player can teleport pets there at all. Checks tppets.tpanywhere permissions and if they are in a ProtectedRegion. Sends that ProtectedRegion's EnterMessage when it's determined that the player can't tp there.
        Parameters:
        pl - The player to check permissions of. The location of the player is checked
        Returns:
        True if they're allowed to, false if they're not allowed to and have been sent a message
